entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
